title: The nexus between pressures and ecosystem services in floodplains: New methods to integrate stakeholders’ knowledge for water quality management in Serbia
content:
Publication date: August 2024

Source: Ecosystem Services, Volume 68

Author(s): Milica Ilić, Zorica Srđević, Bojan Srđević, Barbara Stammel, Tim Borgs, Pavel Benka, Jasna Grabić, Senka Ždero
